original_text: Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a worker who has no need to be ashamed, rightly handling the word of truth.
korean_text: 너는 진리의 말씀을 옳게 분별하며 부끄러울 것이 없는 일꾼으로 인정된 자로 자신을 하나님 앞에 드리기를 힘쓰라

sentences.original_text: Do your best to present yourself to God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님 앞에 너 자신을 바치도록 힘쓰라

sentences.original_text: a worker who has no need to be ashamed
rightly handling the word of truth
